sen.j: ジュンサイ（蓴菜、純菜、Brasenia schreberi）は多年生の水生植物である。
sen.e: Junsai (Brasenia schreberi) is perennial hydrophyte.
Junsai (Brasenia schreberi) is perennial hydrophyte.
Junsai (Brasenia schreberi) is perennial hydrophyte.

sen.j: 澄んだ淡水の池沼に自生する。
sen.e: It grows naturally in clear fresh water ponds.
It grows naturally in clear fresh water ponds.
It grows naturally in clear fresh water ponds.

sen.j: 若芽の部分を食用にするため、栽培されている場合もある。
sen.e: It is sometimes grown as it young buds are edible.
It is sometimes grown as it young buds are edible.
It is sometimes grown as it young buds are edible.

sen.j: ジュンサイは、ハゴロモモ科（別名ジュンサイ科。
sen.e: Junsai belongs to Cabombaceae
sen.cmt: ハゴロモモ科もジュンサイ科も同じ定訳となっていたため、「別名ジュンサイ科」は英訳から省きました。
sen.e: Junsai belongs to Cabombaceae.
sen.cmt: ピリオド補足しました。
sen.e: Junsai belongs to Cabombaceae.

sen.j: またスイレン科に含めることもある）に属し、スイレンなどと同じように葉を水面に浮かべる水草である。
sen.e: (or to Nymphaeaeceae), and is waterweed whose leaves float on the surface of water as water lilies do.
Or it is included in Nymphaeaeceae, and is waterweed whose leaves float on the surface of water as water lilies do.
sen.cmt: 括弧書きを通常文に訂正しました。
sen.e: Or it is included in Nymphaeaeceae, and is waterweed whose leaves float on the surface of water as water lilies do.

sen.j: 日本では北海道～九州及び南西諸島（種子島・沖縄島に分布するが、すでに絶滅した地域もある。
sen.e: In Japan it is distributed from Hokkaido to Kyushu and Nansei Islands (Tanegashima Island and the islands of Okinawa), and in some areas it has gone extinct already.
In Japan it is distributed from Hokkaido to Kyushu and Nansei Islands (Tanegashima Island and the islands of Okinawa), and in some areas it has gone extinct already.
In Japan it is distributed from Hokkaido to Kyushu and Nansei Islands (Tanegashima Island and the islands of Okinawa), and in some areas it has gone extinct already.

sen.j: 日本国外では、東南アジア～インド、アフリカ、オーストラリア、アメリカ州等に広く分布する。
sen.e: Outside of Japan it is distributed widely from Southeast Asia to India, Africa, Australia, and Americas.
Outside of Japan it is distributed widely from Southeast Asia to India, Africa, Australia, and Americas.
Outside of Japan it is distributed widely from Southeast Asia to India, Africa, Australia, and Americas.

sen.j: 多年生の浮葉植物。
sen.e: It is perennial floating leaved plant.
It is perennial floating leaved plant.
It is perennial floating leaved plant.

sen.j: 葉は互生、楕円形で、長さ5～12mm、裏面は紫色。
sen.e: Its leaves are alternate and oval in shape, 5 to 12 mm long, and purple on the back.
Its leaves are alternate and oval in shape, 5 to 12 mm long, and purple on the back.
Its leaves are alternate and oval in shape, 5 to 12 mm long, and purple on the back.

sen.j: 葉柄は裏側の真ん中に着く盾形であり、ハスの葉と同じ付き方である。
sen.e: Leafstalks run the middle of the back of leaves such as shields, in the same way as those of lotus.
Leafstalks run the middle of the back of leaves such as shields, in the same way as those of lotus.
Leafstalks run the middle of the back of leaves such as shields, in the same way as those of lotus.

sen.j: 地下茎は水底の泥の中にある。
sen.e: Its rootstalks are in the mud of the bottom of water.
Its rootstalks are in the mud of the bottom of water.
Its rootstalks are in the mud of the bottom of water.

sen.j: そこから葉柄をのばすのではなく、茎が伸びて水面近くまで達する。
sen.e: Leafstalks do not come out from here but stems extends close to water surface.
Leafstalks do not come out from here but stems extends close to water surface.
Leafstalks do not come out from here but stems extends close to water surface.

sen.j: 秋に地下茎の一部は、養分を貯蔵して越冬用の殖芽となる。
sen.e: In autumn part of the rootstalk stores nutrients to be turion to stay over the winter.
In autumn part of the rootstalk stores nutrients to be turion to stay over the winter.
In autumn part of the rootstalk stores nutrients to be turion to stay over the winter.

sen.j: この茎からまばらに葉柄をのばし、その先に葉をつける。
sen.e: Leafstalks sparsely come out from this part and have leaves on the end.
Leafstalks sparsely come out from this part and have leaves on the end.
Leafstalks sparsely come out from this part and have leaves on the end.

sen.j: 茎の先端の芽の部分や若葉の裏面は寒天質の粘液で厚く覆われ、ぬめりがある。
sen.e: Buds on the end of stems and the back of young leaves are slimy, thickly covered with agar mucilage.
Buds on the end of stems and the back of young leaves are slimy, thickly covered with agar mucilage.
Buds on the end of stems and the back of young leaves are slimy, thickly covered with agar mucilage.

sen.j: 花期は6～8月。
sen.e: It flowers from June to August.
It flowers from June to August.
It flowers from June to August.

sen.j: 花は茎から水面に伸びた柄の先につき、直径1～1.6cm。
sen.e: Flowers are on the end of stems which extend toward water surface, and the diameter is 1 - 1.6 cm.
Flowers are on the end of stems which extend toward water surface, and the diameter is 1 to 1.6 cm.
Flowers are on the end of stems which extend toward water surface, and the diameter is 1 to 1.6 cm.

sen.j: 花弁・がく片は3枚ずつで、スイレンの花を細くしたような姿だが、花弁は紫褐色であまり目立たない。
sen.e: They have three petals and sepals respectively and look like thinner water lily flowers, but do not stand out since the petals are purplish brown.
They have three petals and sepals respectively and look like thinner water lily flowers, but do not stand out since the petals are purplish brown.
They have three petals and sepals respectively and look like thinner water lily flowers, but do not stand out since the petals are purplish brown.

sen.j: 寒天質で覆われた若芽は日本料理で食材として珍重される。
sen.e: Young buds covered with agar are valued as material for Japanese cuisine.
Young buds covered with agar are valued as material for Japanese cuisine.
Young buds covered with agar are valued as material for Japanese cuisine.

sen.j: ジュンサイは秋田県の郷土料理とされ、同県の三種町は生産量日本一である。
sen.e: Junsai is regarded as a local dish of Akita Prefecture, and Mitane Town of Akita has the highest crop.
Junsai is regarded as a local dish of Akita Prefecture, and Mitane Town of Akita has the highest crop.
Junsai is regarded as a local dish of Akita Prefecture, and Mitane Town of Akita has the highest crop.

sen.j: 酢物
sen.e: Vinegared dish
Vinegared dish
Vinegared dish

sen.j: 吸い物
sen.e: Suimono (clear soup)
Suimono (clear soup)
Suimono (clear soup)

sen.j: みそ汁
sen.e: Miso soup
Miso soup
Miso soup

sen.j: スープ（西湖）
sen.e: Soup (Xi Hu, China)
Soup (Xi Hu, China)
Soup (Xi Hu, China)

sen.j: また、北海道七飯町にある大沼国定公園には、大沼 (七飯町)三湖のひとつである蓴菜沼があり、その瓶詰は大沼国定公園の名物として売られている。
sen.e: In Onuma Quasi-National Park of Nanae Town, Hokkaido, there is Junsai Swamp, one of the Onuma main lakes (Nanae Town), and they sell bottled junsai as a special product of the Park.
In Onuma Quasi-National Park of Nanae Town, Hokkaido, there is Junsai Swamp, one of the Onuma main lakes (Nanae Town), and they sell bottled junsai as a special product of the Park.
In Onuma Quasi-National Park of Nanae Town, Hokkaido, there is Junsai Swamp, one of the Onuma main lakes (Nanae Town), and they sell bottled junsai as a special product of the Park.

sen.j: なお、私有地の池で栽培されることが多いため、採集に当たってはきちんと確認すること。
sen.e: Junsai is often grown in private ponds and you have to confirm before you collect junsai.
Junsai is often grown in private ponds and you have to confirm before you collect junsai.
Junsai is often grown in private ponds and you have to confirm before you collect junsai.

sen.j: 万葉集に「ぬなは（沼縄）」として歌に詠まれている。
sen.e: Junsai appears in Manyoshu (the oldest anthology of Japanese poetry) as "nunawa".
Junsai appears in Manyoshu (the oldest anthology of Japanese poetry) as 'nunawa.'
sen.cmt: 原文の「」に合せて"を'に訂正しました。
sen.e: Junsai appears in Manyoshu (the oldest anthology of Japanese poetry) as 'nunawa.'

sen.j: わが情 ゆたにたゆたに 浮ぬなは 辺にも奥にも よりかつましじ
sen.e: My mind fluctuates as floating nunawa, it will never reach any shore or somewhere away.
sen.cmt: このサイトの現代語訳を参照しました。http://manyomakimono.blog118.fc2.com/blog-entry-74.html
sen.e: My mind fluctuates as floating nunawa, it will never reach any shore or somewhere away.
My mind fluctuates as floating nunawa, it will never reach any shore or somewhere away.

sen.j: 生育地である下記の地方公共団体が作成したレッドデータブックに掲載されている。
sen.e: Junsai is referred to in the red data book made by local public bodies mentioned below.
Junsai is referred to in the red data book made by local public bodies mentioned below.
Junsai is referred to in the red data book made by local public bodies mentioned below.

sen.j: 日本全体としては普通種であるが、地域によっては絶滅のおそれが高く、既に絶滅した地域もある。
sen.e: Though it is common species in Japan as a whole, it has high risk of extinction in some areas and has already gone extinct in some other areas.
Though it is common species in Japan as a whole, it has high risk of extinction in some areas and has already gone extinct in some other areas.
Though it is common species in Japan as a whole, it has high risk of extinction in some areas and has already gone extinct in some other areas.

sen.j: 絶滅・減少の要因としては、池沼の開発や水質の悪化等があげられる。
sen.e: The main reasons for extinction and decrease include development of ponds and declining quality of water.
The main reasons for extinction and decrease include development of ponds and declining quality of water.
The main reasons for extinction and decrease include development of ponds and declining quality of water.
